title: Vietnamese beef pho
ingredients: ['3.5L (6 3/8 pints) beef stock', '1 large onion, sliced into rings', '6 slices fresh root ginger', '1 stalk lemon grass', '1 cinnamon stick', '1 teaspoon whole black peppercorns', '500g (1 1/4 lb) beef sirloin steak, cut into thin slices', '225g (8 oz) beansprouts', '1 bunch fresh basil, leaves only', '1 bunch fresh mint, leaves only', '1 bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '3 fresh green chillies, sliced into rings', '2 limes, cut into wedges', '1 (500g) packet dried rice noodles', 'hoisin sauce to serve', 'hot sauce to serve', 'fish sauce to serve']
